籤詩版本二:
Ndinalimba mtima ndi mphepo ndi mvula kuti ndibwerere kunyumba, koma thupi langa lili ngati namzeze
Ndimagwira nio m'kamwa mwanga ndikufuna kupanga maziko, koma mapeto a maziko athyoka ndipo ndevu zaphimbidwa ndi matope.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira chithunzi cha namzeze atanyamula Ni mkamwa mwake.
Chilichonse ndi chotopetsa komanso cholemetsa.
解曰: Mitundu yonse yamatsenga. M'mawa ndi madzulo sizimayima. Ndani akudziwa izi. Pambuyo pake, ndi ntchito yovuta.
籤詩故事一:
◇Dong Yong anaika bambo ake
Dong Yong wa Mzera wa Han anali munthu wa ku Qiancheng. Banja lake linali losauka ndipo mayi ake anamwalira ali wamng’ono, choncho ankafunika kusamalira bambo ake yekha.
Bambo ake atamwalira, Dong Yong analibe ndalama zomuika m’manda, choncho anabwereka ma yuan 10,000 kwa ena kuti akaike bambo ake. M'tsogolomu, ngati ndilibe ndalama zobwezera, ndidzakhala kapolo. Tsiku lililonse amayenera kukatenga katundu umodzi wa nkhuni, madzi akatundu anayi, ndi khasu maekala asanu ndi limodzi kapena asanu ndi awiri a minda, imene ili ntchito yolemetsa.
(Nkhani iyi ndi fanizo la kugwira ntchito molimbika, koma mulibe kanthu.)
聖意: Nyumbayo idzakhala pachiwopsezo kaye kenako zabwino zidzabwera. Samalani kufunafuna chuma, kukhala ndi mgwirizano, kukwatira, kukhala ndi banja loyipa. lungamitsidwa, kusamuka, kupeza katundu wotayika, kuwona matenda, funira zabwino m’phiri ndi m’manda.
